SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the main game instance with its state and components. This class manages players, modifications, decks of cards, game state, and communication with clients.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • reconnection

      public void reconnection(String nickname, VirtualView oldVirtualView, VirtualView newVirtualView) throws RemoteException
      Handles the reconnection of a player with a new VirtualView instance. Updates the player's VirtualView and notifies listeners accordingly.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player reconnecting.
      oldVirtualView - The old VirtualView instance associated with the player.
      newVirtualView - The new VirtualView instance to associate with the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • addPlayers

      public void addPlayers(ArrayList<Player> players, ArrayList<VirtualView> clients) throws RemoteException
      Method that given an arraylist of players, assign them a color, shuffle their order and add em to the game
      Parameters:
      players - arraylist of players who will play in the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • draw

      public Card draw(String name, int index) throws RemoteException
      Given the name of a player and an index representing his choice, this method removes a card from the table and adds it to the hand of the player
      Parameters:
      index - integer representing the choice, 1-2 gold , 3-4 resources, 5-6 decks
      Returns:
      Card or null if indexOutOfBound or position empty
      Throws:
      RemoteException
